revised_title: Inheritance of Wrinkledness and Roundness in Peas: Starch-Grain Analysis
tldr: The author investigates the inheritance of roundness and wrinkledness in peas through a study of their starch-grains. They find that the starch-grains in F2 hybrid seeds are intermediate between those of round and wrinkled peas, providing insights into the segregation of these traits in subsequent generations.
